description: It is believed that a patch management system for an anti-virus product commonly installed among targeted companies was used to distribute the [Wiper](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0041) malware.(Citation: Dell Wiper)

external_references.description: Dell SecureWorks. (2013, March 21). Wiper Malware Analysis Attacking Korean Financial Sector. Retrieved May 13, 2015.
